# verses

--

## obtain
`[xonsh] pip install verses`

--

## tutorial
`[xonsh] verses help`

--

## structure
```
	/verses_1
		/trends
		/mints
		verses.JSON {
				"trends": {
					"path": "trends"
				},
				"mints": {
					"path": "mints"
				}
			}
```

## start
From anywhere higher than the "verses.JSON" file.   
```
[xonsh] verses trends turn-on
```
